The most addicting tower defense game returns in an all-new prequel adventure - welcome to Kingdom Rush: Origins!

** Now featured on NVIDIA TegraZone **


Praise for the Kingdom Rush series: the #1 Strategy Game franchise for Mobile, GoogleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s EditorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Choice Award, IGN Editor's Choice, Slide To Play Must Have, GameInformer Gold Award, 148 Apps Editor's Choice, Jay is Games Game of the Year, Pocket Gamer Gold Award,CNET Best iPad Games, CNET EditorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Choice Award, Gamezebo 4.5/5, Touch Arcade 4.5/5, Venturebeat 94/100.


Kingdom Rush Origins is the third installment of the award-winning Kingdom Rush saga, loved by millions and earning accolades from gamers and critics around the globe. Take a trip back to the beginning, before VezÃ¢â‚¬â„¢nan ever thought to threaten the kingdom with the gem of power, and experience even more of the lightning-fast, exceptionally captivating gameplay that made the franchise a cornerstone of essential tower defense games. In this exciting prequel, command your elven army and defend mystical lands from sea serpents, evil sorcerers, and wave after wave of gnoll tribesman, all with the help of brand-spankinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ new towers, heroes, and spells to fend off every last baddie.

Kingdom Rush Origins packs in a treasure trove of new content and features while keeping the signature look that millions have come to love.


GAME FEATURES

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Re-enter the world of Kingdom Rush: visit mysterious elven forests, magical faery realms and even floating ruins of an ancient metropolis!

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Unleash the power of the elves with brand new towers and troops! Elf Archers, Mystic Mages, Stone Druids and the Elven Infantry make up the backbone of your army.

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Discover eight new specialized tower upgrades with over 18 abilities! Vanquish your enemies with elven marksmen, runed bears, magic-wielding wizards, and even giant animated trees.

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Take up arms against 30 new enemy types and engage in epic boss battles! Face hordes of Gnolls, giant spiders, and the terrible Twilight army.

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Master and upgrade nine legendary heroes and their awesome powers and spells!

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Rain lightning, summon reinforcements, and use each heroÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s unique power to obliterate scores of enemies!

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Immerse yourself in hours of gameplay with over 70 achievements, with three difficulty modes for the newbs and veterans alike.

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Play different game modes - Classic, Iron, and Heroic - and prove your mettle as a master tactician.

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Purchase new-and-improved equipment using your hard earned gems in a revamped Gnome shop.

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Study your enemies and your towers with an in-game encyclopedia.

WHAT'S NEW

Our Queen is worried. General, we need you to lead an expedition to the Dwarven Kingdom in the mountains, and unveil the reasons behind this ominous silence. We fear the worst.
To guide us in our path, Wilbur the Engineer and his excessively armed flying contraption will accompany us and fight by our side.
Fight against four new enemies! Deformed and corrupted creatures at the service of a menacing new evil leader.
Face Godieth The Pit Lord!
Meet allies, find Easter Eggs and enjoy the fight!
